summary: The story of Ruby, 13, determined to grow up fast after her mother runs away to become a movie star, leaving Ruby with her hopelessly rural father.
cast: Shawn Doyle|Tatiana Maslany|Julia Kennedy|Jonny Harris|Andy Jones|Mark O'Brien|Steve Cochrane|Maggie Meyer|Mary Lewis|Sherry White|Susan Kent|Sean Panting|Sarah Small|Joel Thomas Hynes|Deidre Gillard-Rowlings|Melanie Caines|Kevin Lewis|Chris MacCarthy|Jeff Conway|Mack Furlong|James Hawksley|Nick Burry|Scott Yetman|David Feehan|Mary Walsh
keywords: newfoundland canada|sexual awakening|foreskin|parental neglect|mother abandons daughter
title: Grown Up Movie Star
